entry.tran: （尤指政客中）守旧的人，地方组织成员
entry.def: Backwoodsmen are people, especially politicians, who like the old ways of doing things, or who are involved in an organization at a local level.

example.ex: ...Republican Party backwoodsmen in the United States.

means.word_mean: 1. a man who lives on the frontier
